name: REFLECTRON (Delta)
description:
Small puzzle game where you program the robot to do tasks!
Your objective is simple - point laser beam at detector. However there may be a catch: how to deal with situations when there are no direct view of detector? Answer is simple - use mirrors.

I've followed the principle "quality over quantity" so there are only 3 levels, but all of them are tested to be beatable!

Be aware, hints lie here! ---1---
right 1.8
left 0.001
laseron

---2---
right 5.8
addangle 67
laseron
addangle -67
wait 1.2
left 1

---3---
left 3.7
right 0.001
laseron
addangle 33
wait 0.5
addangle -48.5
wait 1.8
addangle 33
left 4

And btw copy-paste may not work, sorry for that

Do not forget to share your time in comments!
